titles.title: Mandatory Funding for Veterans Act of 2007
To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for an assured adequate level of funding for veterans health care.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: 3/7/2007--Introduced. Mandatory Funding for Veterans Act of 2007 - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to make available to the Secretary of Veterans Affairs for each fiscal year the amount determined under a specified formula for veterans health care programs, functions, and activities of the Veterans Health Administration of the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA).
